item.title: A Survey of Automatic Query Expansion in Information Retrieval
item.description:
• Motivation
  • Keywords
  • Introduction
  • Solution:HOW AQE WORKS
  • Conclusion

Carpineto, C. and Romano, G. 2012. A survey of automatic query expansion in information retrieval. ACM Comput. Surv. 44, 1, Article 1 (January 2012), 50 pages.
DOI = 10.1145/2071389.2071390 http://doi.acm.org/10.1145/2071389.2071390

Motivation

The relative ineffectiveness of information retrieval systems is largely caused by the inaccuracy with which a query formed by a few keywords models the actual user information need.
One well known method to over- come this limitation is automatic query expansion (AQE), whereby the user’s original...

item.title: Leveraging semantic resources in diversified query expansion
item.description:
• Motivation
  • Keywords
  • Introduction
  • Problem statement and solution framework
  • Evaluation
  • Conclusion

Motivation

Search engines hedge their bets by diversifying top results to cover multiple such possibilities so that the user is likely to be satisfied, whatever be her intended interpretation.Diversified Query Expansion is the problem of diversifying query expansion suggestions, so that the user can specialize the query to better suit her intent, even before perusing search results.

Keywords

Query expansion · Diversification · Semantic search · Wikipedia · Entity ranking

Introduction

Search...

item.title: The city gate is open
item.description:
城门开
北岛|赵振开

在我的城市里，时间倒流，枯木逢春，消失的气味儿、声音和光线被召回，被拆除的四合院、胡同和寺庙恢复原貌，瓦顶排浪般涌向低低的天际线，鸽哨响彻深深地蓝天，孩子们熟知四季的变化，居民们胸有方向感。

大妈在体育馆门口，“嘿，姑娘，给我俩老太婆照张相来”！于是欢欣地跑过去，被亲切融化在笑容里。北京人说话，或者东北人说话，听到声音就会使人发笑。这感觉怎么形容呢，仿佛听到两个小孩趴在地上，正儿八经地讨论蚂蚁挪步的方向。是被逗乐的笑吧，人家明明没在讲笑话来着。那么自然的就被照亮了，说不出为什么。

于是很喜欢北京的味道。有什么说什么，当然政治除外。北岛的这本散文他想要记下的是在北京城童年到青年的生活，计划经济、三年自然灾害、文化大革命这样讳莫如深的名词竟然是他们的普通日子。照道理说来，处于政治波动的时期，也许是灰色难捱的，但北岛他怀念，是城是人，不是历史。也许可以理解为，这座城市自始至终都没变过，它就像无辜的孩子看着这部默剧，庄重也好，困顿也好，荒谬也好，颓唐也好，都不重要。怎么能怪孩子呢，作怪的一直只有大人，对外界温度的感受和反应，才是他想要恢复的记忆。

痴迷于命运的纠缠和游离，过往人写起来，很容易就装作老者，”他后来的结局正印证此时的预言，当然这是后话了”，其实中间都有段漫长的故事可以说。散文之所以读起来舒服，是因为写得自然，小人物的形象尤其可以抓住人心。

item.title: Introduction to elasticsearch
item.description:
• Elasticsearch
  • Structure
  • Search Type
  • Scoring

Elasticsearch

is a search engine based on Lucene. It provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents.

Structure

Relational DB-> Databases-> Tables->Rows -> Columns
 Elasticsearch-> Indices  -> Types ->Documents -> Fields

Search Type

Structured search(term)
Full-text search(analysis)

Scoring

It uses Lucene’s Practical Scoring Function,combining the TF/IDF score with other factors such as the term proximity in phrase queries, or term similarity in fuzzy queries.

  • Boolean...

item.title: leetcode535.Encode and Decode TinyURL
item.description:
• Problem
  • Solution

Encode and Decode TinyURL
This is a String handler problem.

Problem

TinyURL is a URL shortening service where you enter a URL such as https://leetcode.com/problems/design-tinyurl and it returns a short URL such as http://tinyurl.com/4e9iAk.

Design the encode and decode methods for the TinyURL service. There is no restriction on how your encode/decode algorithm should work. You just need to ensure that a URL can be encoded to a tiny URL and the tiny URL can be decoded to the original URL.

Solution

To build...

item.title: leetcode595.Big Countries
item.description:
• Problem
  • Solution

Write a SQL solution to output big countries’ info
So here it is.I am beginning the LeetCode train in the difficulty order(through easy to hard).

Problem


Solution

This is a simply problem which using where and or is enough to solve.

select name, population, area
from World
where area > 3000000
or
population > 25000000;


After reading solutions, It seems where and union is also a kind of...

item.title: Dad, where are we going
item.description:
After being a college student, I just tend to watch less tv shows and more tv series than before. One exception is Dad, where are we going. Imagine the flashlights around the children, I still can’t help watching it once a week. And next week the fifth season is going to the end. It’s not a signature to make a difference to myself or realize something significant. Maybe I’m just eager to write down the feelings in this certain period.

Various parents and various children make up various families.There is no right or wrong comments since the social background and...

item.title: Active Directory
item.description:
• Introduction
  • Solution
  • Example

Introduction

These days, I am doing some work on Active Directory administration system meant to monitor the user, group under the same domain environment.

Suppose that there are hundreds of users in a company, administrators should add his or her entry permission to each user account. It’s quite annoying, right? So its necessary to administrate all users and create groups with different authorizations.

The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) is an open, standards-based, mature, efficient, extensible, and popular means of interacting with the data contained in directory...
